title: #106: Special Episode: 265+ Victims and Counting
description:
The #RCP team Jim, Laura and Lisa are back together to discuss the courageous women voices who held a prolific serial predator to account. Our expert team highlight lessons to be learned and profile why Nassar got away with it for so long as he heads back to court to face more victims and a further sentence. 


This is a must listen about how to protect and prevent child sexual victimisation. 


#LessonsToBeLearned #VictimsVoices #VictimsMatter

New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrimw
